title: Family
description: I've been married to my wife [Emma Hudelson](https://emmahudelson.com) since 2013. We have two amazing daughters. My family is my purpose.

title: Yoga
description: I struggled with back issues most of my life, culminating in a spinal fusion in 2013. A few years later, I discovered Ashtanga yoga, which has become central to my physical and mental well-being. My back thanks me daily.

title: Board Games
description: Two-time Settlers of Catan National semi-finalist and 2011 Catan Masters co-champion. Other favorites: Terraforming Mars, Race for the Galaxy, and Power Grid.

title: Running
description: I've been a competitive runner since age 12. My coach is [Matt Ebersole of Personal Best Training](https://matt-ebersole.squarespace.com). Catch me running the Boston Marathon in 2027 or vying for the top spot at local races in Eastern Kentucky.
